buildingLicenses.rule1: The customer is obligated not to throw waste and not to damage the industrial city facilitie his violation will be applied to the list of fines and penalties for violations and water and sewage facilities 29 dated / health issued by the authority’s board of directors decision No. 28 and 200416 H / 11/29/7 / 1425H and based on Cabinet Resolution No. 225 dated 1425.
buildingLicenses.rule2: This license is considered void if the customer does not start construction works within one month release date.
buildingLicenses.rule3: Erecting a temporary fence (removable during implementation) around the work site, taking all Precautions to avoid any damage that may result from work.
buildingLicenses.rule4: Full commitment and scrutiny of all that is mentioned in the plans for the construction process and previously approved by the authority.
buildingLicenses.rule5: Keep a copy of the license at the work site on an ongoing basis and in a prominent place.
buildingLicenses.rule6: Putting a sign in a prominent place outside the temporary fence showing the name of the project and the implementing contractor and the consultant and addresses.
buildingLicenses.rule7: Remove all debris and construction violations from the site and its vicinity up to date and move them to authorized places outside the industrial city.
buildingLicenses.rule8: The consulting office supervising the implementation of the plant shall conform to the approved plans on what is implemented on the ground and providing the Authority with monthly reports on compliance or any violations that occur during implementation.

planApproval.p1: The Engineering Support Program service enables MODON clients who wish to approve their plans to apply for approval of their plans electronically through the program and is directly linked with qualified consulting offices in MODON.
planApproval.p2: The program allows customers to invite consulting offices to submit quotations for the implementation of the client's engineering services and provides the option for the customer to choose the most appropriate price from the list of quotations.
planApproval.p3: The program allows the customer to choose between the following services and apply for them:
planApproval.r2: Approving a plan amendment or expansion
planApproval.p4: The client can also evaluate the performance of the consulting office upon completion of the service implementation
planApproval.p5: The engineering support program monitors the workflow of clients' requests and ensures compliance with performance indicators and the quality of the work executed
planApproval.p6: The customer is obligated to choose the appropriate service and clarify all the data required to be executed in order to provide the appropriate service price
planApproval.p7: All work and outputs that are carried out through the program bear the full responsibility of the consulting office that carries them out and do not fall on the engineering support program nor the Saudi Authority for Industrial Estates and Technology Zones. The responsibility of the engineering support program is limited to organizing the process of approval and approval of the plans
planApproval.p8: The engineering support program service enables MODON clients who wish to approve their plans to apply for approval of their plans electronically through the program, and the link is made directly with the qualified consulting offices in MODON.
planApproval.p9: It requires studying the customer’s request well to provide the most appropriate price for the implementation of the requested service. A response to this request is required within 3 days of receiving this message, provided that the consulting office is committed to the price offered to implement the service.
planApproval.p10: In the event that the consulting office is chosen, the consulting office is obligated to implement the required service in accordance with the guide to standards and requirements for building in industrial cities and with performance indicators in all stages of the program.
planApproval.p11: The general plan or safety scheme is required for approval within a period not exceeding 15 working days from the date the customer signs the contract, and the detailed plans are also required to be submitted within a period not exceeding 15 days from the date of the general plan approval.
planApproval.p12: All works and outputs that are carried out through the program bear the full responsibility of the consulting office that carries them out, and they do not fall on the engineering support program or the Saudi Authority for Industrial Estates and Technology Zones, and the responsibility of the Engineering Support Program is limited to organizing the process of approving the plans only.

CRTypes.Investor: The investor: The enterprise of type investor is entitled to apply for contract submission service and contract management services.
CRTypes.InvestorForPrivateCity: The investor from a private city: The enterprise of type investor from a private city is entitled to apply for contract management services.
CRTypes.GovernmentalAgency: Governmental entity: The enterprise of type governmental entity is entitled to apply for contract submission and contract management services.
CRTypes.ConsultingOffice: Consultant office: The enterprise of type consultant office is entitled to apply for qualification service and consulting services for investors' contracts.
CRTypes.Contractor: Contractor: The enterprise of type contractor is entitled to apply for qualification service and contractor services for investors' contracts.
